ABOUT_ME_RBLX: I specialize in developing games on Roblox, with a main focus on core backend systems, procedural generation, and gameplay mechanics. I do great in the logical part of the code, like inventory systems, generational algorithms, framework designing, and network handling. I also have experience in front-end development, especially in designing combat effects.
ABOUT_ME_WEB: Beyond game development, I am a full-stack web developer, proficient both in back-end and front-end technologies. My specialization includes Java with Spring Boot for back-end development and Angular for front-end applications, though I'm also comfortable working with just plain HTML or PHP.
ABOUT_ME_BLENDER: I also have lot of experience with blender. I have experience with sculpting, mainly sculpting humanoid characters. I also have experience with creating models with basic subdivison workflow. I can also do textures, both within blender and adobe substance painter.
